title: rtabulator
text: render table just pass data frame tabulator function: case, column definitions automatically created . horizontal alignment character columns set left numeric columns aligned right.
code: tabulator(airquality)

title: rtabulator
text: tabulator_options can customize table (spreadsheet):
code: setup <- tabulator_options(   pagination = TRUE,   pagination_size = 10,   pagination_size_selector = c(10, 20, 50) )  tabulator(USArrests, setup)

title: rtabulator
text: customize columns easiest way use set_formatter_* functions:
code: tabulator(airquality) |>   set_formatter_progress("Temp", legend = TRUE, legend_align = "left") |>   set_formatter_traffic_light("Ozone")

title: rtabulator
text: can create multi column headers set_multi_column_header:
code: headers <- list(   Sepal = c("Sepal_Width", "Sepal_Length"),   Petal = c("Petal_Width", "Petal_Length") )  tabulator(iris) |>   set_multi_column_header(headers)

title: rtabulator
text: create empty spreadsheet just pass empty list data parameter spreadsheet = TRUE tabulator function:
code: tabulator(data = list(), spreadsheet = TRUE)

title: R Bindings for Tabulator JS
text: goal rtabulator make breeze creating beautiful reactive tables using Tabulator JS

title: R Bindings for Tabulator JS
text: Filters Grouping Multiple column formatters (images, html, progress bar, …) Multiple themes Multi column headers Spreadsheet mode supporting multiple sheets Cell editing supporting validation Downloads (json, csv, xlsx) Interactivity

title: R Bindings for Tabulator JS
text: CRAN can install rtabulator : can install development version rtabulator like :
code: install.packages("rtabulator") remotes::install_github("eodaGmbH/rtabulator")

title: R Bindings for Tabulator JS
code: library(rtabulator)  tabulator(mtcars)  # Set theme tabulator(iris, theme = "midnight")  # Format columns tabulator(airquality) |>   set_formatter_progress(     column = "Temp",     legend = TRUE,     legend_align = "left"   )  # Spreadsheet mode tabulator(data = list(), spreadsheet = TRUE)

code: data <- data.frame(   age = c(10, 20, 40),   first_name = c("Franz", "Ferdinand", "Julia"),   last_name = c("Young", "Bowie", "Blackey") )  tabulator(data, width = 500) |>   set_column_editor(c("first_name", "last_name")) |>   set_column_editor("age", type = "number")  {"x":{"data":{"age":[10,20,40],"first_name":["Franz","Ferdinand","Julia"],"last_name":["Young","Bowie","Blackey"],"id":[1,2,3]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationSizeSelector":false,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"age","field":"age","hozAlign":"right","editor":"number"},{"title":"first_name","field":"first_name","hozAlign":"left","editor":"input"},{"title":"last_name","field":"last_name","hozAlign":"left","editor":"input"}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . height (character): CSS value height image. width (character): CSS value width image. url_prefix (character): String add start cell value generating image src url. url_suffix (character): String add end cell value generating image src url. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Image Formatter — set_formatter_image
code: image_url <- "https://picsum.photos/id/" image_size <- 100  image_data <- data.frame(   image = c(88, 98, 102, 201),   label = c("Pic No. 88", "Pic No. 98", "Pic No. 102", "Pic No 201") )  tabulator(image_data, tabulator_options(height = "400px")) |>   set_formatter_image(     "image",     height = image_size,     width = image_size,     url_prefix = image_url,     url_suffix = glue::glue("/{image_size}"),     hoz_align = "left"   )  {"x":{"data":{"image":[88,98,102,201],"label":["Pic No. 88","Pic No. 98","Pic No. 102","Pic No 201"],"id":[1,2,3,4]},"options":{"height":"400px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationSizeSelector":false,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"image","field":"image","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"image","formatterParams":{"height":100,"width":100,"urlPrefix":"https://picsum.photos/id/","urlSuffix":"/100"}},{"title":"label","field":"label","hozAlign":"left"}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Link Formatter — set_formatter_link
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . label_field (character): Column used label link. url_prefix (character): Prefix add URL value. url (JS function): JS function return URL value. cell passed function first argument. Use JS pass JS code. target (character): Target attribute anchor tag. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Link Formatter — set_formatter_link
code: data <- data.frame(   label = c("This is a link", "This is another link"),   link = c("https://eoda.de", "https://eoda.de/data-science"),   link2 = c("eoda.de", "github.com"),   link3 = c("guinan", "data-science") )  js_func <- "(cell) => `https://eoda.de/${cell.getValue()}`"  tabulator(data) |>   set_formatter_link("link", label_field = "label") |>   set_formatter_link("link2", url_prefix = "https://") |>   set_formatter_link("link3", url = htmlwidgets::JS(js_func), label_field = "label")  {"x":{"data":{"label":["This is a link","This is another link"],"link":["https://eoda.de","https://eoda.de/data-science"],"link2":["eoda.de","github.com"],"link3":["guinan","data-science"],"id":[1,2]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationSizeSelector":false,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"label","field":"label","hozAlign":"left"},{"title":"link","field":"link","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"link","formatterParams":{"labelField":"label","target":"_blank"}},{"title":"link2","field":"link2","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"link","formatterParams":{"urlPrefix":"https://","target":"_blank"}},{"title":"link3","field":"link3","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"link","formatterParams":{"labelField":"label","url":"(cell) => `https://eoda.de/${cell.getValue()}`","target":"_blank"}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":["options.columns.3.formatterParams.url"],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Money Formatter — set_formatter_money
code: set_formatter_money(   widget,   column,   decimal = c(",", "."),   thousand = c(".", ","),   symbol = "$",   symbol_after = "p",   negative_sign = "-",   precision = FALSE,   hoz_align = "left" )

title: Money Formatter — set_formatter_money
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . decimal (character): Symbol represent decimal point. thousand (character, bool): Symbol represent thousands separator. Set FALSE disable separator. symbol (character): currency symbol. symbol_after (bool): Whether put symbol number. negative_sign (character, bool): sign show front number. Set TRUE causes negative numbers enclosed brackets (123.45), standard style negative numbers accounting. precision (integer, bool): number decimals display. Set FALSE display decimals provided. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Money Formatter — set_formatter_money
code: data <- data.frame(   Account_Number = c(     123456,     345667,     234567,     234566   ),   Account_Balance = c(100, -50, 200.30, -21.5) )  tabulator(data) |>   set_formatter_money(     "Account_Balance",     symbol = "\U20AC",     symbol_after = FALSE,     hoz_align = "right"   )  {"x":{"data":{"Account_Number":[123456,345667,234567,234566],"Account_Balance":[100,-50,200.3,-21.5],"id":[1,2,3,4]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationSizeSelector":false,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"Account_Number","field":"Account_Number","hozAlign":"right"},{"title":"Account_Balance","field":"Account_Balance","hozAlign":"right","formatter":"money","formatterParams":{"decimal":",","thousand":".","symbol":"€","symbolAfter":false,"negativeSign":"-","precision":false}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

code: set_formatter_progress(   widget,   column,   min = NA,   max = NA,   color = c("yellow", "orange", "red"),   legend = NA,   legend_color = "#000000",   legend_align = c("center", "left", "right", "justify"),   hoz_align = "left" )

title: Progress Formatter — set_formatter_progress
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . min (numeric): minimum value progress bar. set NA minimum value column used. max (numeric): maximum value progress bar. set NA maximum value column used. color (character): Either single color vector colors legend (character, TRUE, JavaScript function): set TRUE value cell displayed. Set NA display value . Use JS pass JS function legend. cell value passed function first argument. legend_color (character): text color legend. legend_align (character): text alignment legend. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Progress Formatter — set_formatter_progress
code: data <- data.frame(   id = 1:6,   value = c(10, 0, 100, 20, 40, 60),   value2 = c(10, 0, 100, 20, 40, 60),   value3 = c(10, 0, 100, 20, 40, 60) )  js_func <- htmlwidgets::JS("(cellValue) => `${cellValue}%`")  tabulator(data) |>   set_formatter_progress("value") |>   set_formatter_progress("value2", legend = TRUE, legend_align = "left") |>   set_formatter_progress("value3", legend = js_func, legend_align = "right")  {"x":{"data":{"id":[1,2,3,4,5,6],"value":[10,0,100,20,40,60],"value2":[10,0,100,20,40,60],"value3":[10,0,100,20,40,60]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationSizeSelector":false,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"id","field":"id","hozAlign":"right"},{"title":"value","field":"value","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"progress","formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100,"color":["yellow","orange","red"],"legend":null,"legendColor":"#000000","legendAlign":"center"}},{"title":"value2","field":"value2","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"progress","formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100,"color":["yellow","orange","red"],"legend":true,"legendColor":"#000000","legendAlign":"left"}},{"title":"value3","field":"value3","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"progress","formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100,"color":["yellow","orange","red"],"legend":"(cellValue) => `${cellValue}%`","legendColor":"#000000","legendAlign":"right"}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":["options.columns.3.formatterParams.legend"],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Tabulator Setup Options — tabulator_options
text: height (character) height table px. history (bool): Enable user interaction history functionality. columns (list): Column definitions. set NULL definitions auto generated table data. layout (character): Layout mode table columns. responsive_layout (bool): Automatically hide show columns fit width Tabulator element. movable_columns (bool): Allow users move reorder rows. header_visible (bool): Whether header visible. row_height (numeric): fixed height rows. add_row_pos (character): table position new rows added. movable_rows (bool): Allow users move reorder rows. resizable_rows (bool): Allow user resize rows. frozen_rows (numeric): Number frozen rows. index (character): Field used unique index row. group_by (character): Field group rows . edit_trigger_event (character): Event triggers cell edit. selectable_rows (character, bool, integer) Set FALSE disble row selection. set TRUE can select many rows want. set "highlight" rows just highlighted change state clicked. integer value sets maximum number rows can selected. pagination (bool): Whether enable pagination. pagination_size (integer): Number rows page. pagination_size_selector (list): Add pagination size selector. pagination_add_row (character): add rows table pagination enabled. spreadsheet (bool): Whether enable spreadsheet mode. spreadsheet_rows (integer): Number spreadsheet rows. spreadsheet_columns (integer): Number spreadsheet columns. spreadsheet_column_definition Column definition used columns sheet. spreadsheet_sheets (list): List sheet definitions. spreadsheet_sheet_tabs (bool): Whether show sheet tabs footer. ... options.
